item.title: Switching to Netlify for static hosting
item.description: Previously I had my website hosted in a GCP instance behind nginx. That really was too much overhead for what I actually needed for this site. A couple of the downsides: Manual setup of the entire GCP instance No CI pipeline No CDN Expensive Manual Set Up I go over in my previous post, Creating and Deploying This Website. In summary, I was previously using the free tier of GCP to host a nano sized instance that contained nGINX and several static websites.
